properties.name: Boston Public Library
properties.location: 700 Boylston St, Boston, MA 02116, United States
properties.description: Boston Public Library, established in 1848, is renowned for its stunning architecture and vast collection of books, manuscripts, and art. The Central Library in Copley Square features a grand entryway adorned with murals, and its historic reading rooms offer a serene atmosphere for visitors. The library boasts a picturesque courtyard and hosts a variety of events, making it a cultural hub in the city. With over 23 million items in its collections, including rare books and artworks, it serves as a crucial resource for both research and leisure. Visitors can explore exhibitions and enjoy the tranquil setting for study and reflection.

properties.name: Leif Erikson Statue
properties.location: Commonwealth Ave, Charlesgate E at Boston, MA 02215 USA
properties.description: The Leif Erikson Statue in Boston honors the Norse explorer credited with being the first European to set foot in North America. This bronze monument, situated along Commonwealth Avenue, depicts Erikson standing proudly with his hand raised, symbolizing exploration and bravery. The statue is surrounded by scenic views and green spaces, making it a popular stop for visitors and locals alike. It serves as a reminder of the rich maritime history and cultural connections between Boston and its early explorers.

properties.name: CITGO Sign
properties.location: 660 Beacon St Boston, MA 02215 United States
properties.description: The CITGO Sign, an iconic symbol of Boston, is recognized by its distinct neon lights and giant logo prominently displayed above the Kenmore Square area. Originally erected in 1965, the sign has become a beloved part of the city's skyline, often serving as a point of reference for both locals and visitors. It attracts many tourists who come to capture photos and experience the bustling atmosphere of surrounding neighborhoods. The sign is not just a landmark but also a historic beacon for sports fans, especially during Boston Red Sox games, creating a vibrant backdrop for celebrations.

properties.name: Temple Ohabei Shalom
properties.location:
1187 Beacon St
Brookline, MA 02446
USA
properties.description: Temple Ohabei Shalom is one of the oldest synagogues in Massachusetts, founded in 1852. Located in Brookline, it is known for its striking architecture and significant contributions to Jewish life in the area. The temple features beautiful stained glass windows and intricate designs that reflect its rich history. It serves as a center for worship, community events, and educational programs, welcoming individuals and families from various backgrounds. The synagogue is a testament to the vibrant Jewish heritage in the region and plays a vital role in community engagement.

properties.name: Boston Red Sox
properties.location:
4 Jersey St
Boston, MA 02215
United States
properties.description: The Boston Red Sox is a professional baseball team founded in 1901, and they are one of the most storied franchises in Major League Baseball. The team plays its home games at Fenway Park, which is the oldest ballpark in MLB, having opened in 1912. Fenway Park is famous for its iconic 'Green Monster' left-field wall and is a must-visit for baseball fans. The Red Sox have won multiple World Series titles, with their first in 1903 and a historic win in 2004 that ended an 86-year championship drought. The team's passionate fan base and historic rivalries, particularly with the New York Yankees, make attending a game a memorable experience.

properties.name: Coolidge Corner Theatre
properties.location:
290 Harvard St
Brookline, MA 02446
United States
properties.description: The Coolidge Corner Theatre, a cinema in Brookline, Massachusetts, has been operating since 1933. This independent, non-profit movie theater showcases classic, foreign, independent, and art films, in addition to new releases. The main theater features Art Deco decor, while smaller theaters cater to smaller audiences. They also have a concession stand/snack bar, including a decent selection of beer and wine, and host special events such as kids' cinema, midnight showings, and directors' talks. The theater has undergone renovations to enhance the viewer experience.

properties.name: Clayroom
properties.location:
1408 Beacon St
Brookline, MA 02446
United States
properties.description: The Clayroom is a vibrant paint-your-own pottery studio in Brookline, Massachusetts, offering a diverse selection of ceramic pieces and 56 colors for personalization. It serves as a creative venue for individuals and groups, including children, families, and adults, providing a fun and engaging activity for all ages. The studio also offers private pottery classes for beginners, with multiple daily sessions available. Visitors are welcome to bring their own food and beverages, enhancing the relaxed and enjoyable atmosphere. The Clayroom is an ideal destination for those seeking a unique and artistic experience in the Brookline area.

properties.name: Chestnut Hill Reservation
properties.location:
Beacon Street
Brighton, MA 02135
United States
properties.description: Chestnut Hill Reservation is a scenic outdoor area in Brighton, Massachusetts, offering lush landscapes and tranquil waters. Spanning over 600 acres, the reservation is home to a variety of wildlife and features walking and hiking trails that invite visitors to explore its natural beauty. It also includes facilities for fishing, picnicking, and sports activities, making it a favorite spot for families and outdoor enthusiasts. The reservation's picturesque views of the Chestnut Hill Reservoir and surrounding greenery provide a peaceful escape from urban life.

properties.name: McMullen Museum of Art, Boston College
properties.location:
2101 Commonwealth Ave
Boston, MA 02135
United States
properties.description: The McMullen Museum of Art is Boston College's university art museum, known for its multidisciplinary exhibitions that have garnered national and international recognition. Relocated in September 2016 to 2101 Commonwealth Avenue, it boasts nearly double the exhibition space of its previous location. The museum's permanent collection includes European, Asian, and American art, featuring Gothic and Baroque tapestries, Italian paintings from the 16th and 17th centuries, and American paintings from the 19th and early 20th centuries.

properties.name: Saint Ignatius of Loyola Catholic Church
properties.location:
28 Commonwealth Ave
Chestnut Hill, MA 02467
United States
properties.description: Saint Ignatius of Loyola Catholic Church is a prominent church located in Chestnut Hill, Massachusetts. Renowned for its stunning Gothic architecture, the church features beautiful stained glass windows and intricate woodwork, making it a significant landmark in the area. The church is part of the Jesuit tradition and serves not only as a place of worship but also as a community hub, hosting various events and activities for parishioners. Its peaceful surroundings and artistic features attract visitors and residents alike, making it a serene spot for reflection and connection.

properties.name: Bullough's Pond
properties.location:
Bullough Park
Newton, MA 02460
United States
properties.description: Bullough's Pond, established in 1664 by Captain John Spring to power a grist mill, is a historic mill pond located in Newton, Massachusetts. Over the years, it has transformed into a cherished recreational area, offering activities such as birdwatching, fishing, and walking along its scenic trails. The pond is home to a diverse array of bird species, including Great Blue Herons, Mallards, and Wood Ducks, making it a popular spot for nature enthusiasts. In the winter months, the pond has historically been a venue for ice skating and hockey, though these activities have declined due to changes in the pond's depth and ice conditions. The Bullough's Pond Association, a dedicated nonprofit organization, actively works to preserve and enhance the pond's natural beauty and historical significance, ensuring it remains a valuable resource for the Newton community.

properties.name: Brae Burn Country Club
properties.location:
326 Fuller St
Newton, MA 02465
United States
properties.description: Brae Burn Country Club is a prestigious private golf club in Newton, Massachusetts, known for its historic course designed by renowned architects. Established in the early 20th century, the club offers a range of recreational activities including golf, tennis, and dining. The clubhouse features elegant facilities for social gatherings and events, providing members with a welcoming atmosphere. The lush landscapes and scenic views enhance the overall experience, making it a valued community hub for golf enthusiasts and families alike.

properties.name: The Painting Place 4 Fun
properties.location:
GPS USE, 380 Washington Street, 11 Laurel Ave
Wellesley, MA 02481
United States
properties.description: The Painting Place 4 Fun is a vibrant art studio in Wellesley, Massachusetts, offering a variety of creative activities for all ages. Visitors can engage in painting pottery, plaster, and canvas, as well as making candles, mosaics, and slime. The studio also features a gem mining area, adding an adventurous twist to the artistic experience. With over 3,200 square feet of space, it includes a private party room and hosts events such as birthday parties, camps, bridal showers, team-building activities, and holiday parties. The studio is wheelchair accessible and provides ample free parking. Projects are individually priced, with no additional studio or glazing fees. The studio operates seven days a week, welcoming both walk-ins and reservations.

properties.name: Lake Waban
properties.location: Lake Waban, Wellesley, MA 02481, USA
properties.description: Lake Waban is a picturesque natural lake situated on the campus of Wellesley College in Massachusetts. It spans approximately 40 acres and is surrounded by scenic walking trails, making it a popular destination for hiking, bird watching, and enjoying the tranquility of nature. The lake is an integral part of the college's landscape, providing a serene backdrop for students and visitors alike. It is also home to a variety of wildlife, including ducks and swans, adding to its natural charm. The lake's proximity to the college makes it a convenient and accessible spot for leisurely outdoor activities.

properties.name: Morses Pond
properties.location:
Morses Pond
Massachusetts
USA
properties.description: Morses Pond is a natural freshwater pond located in Wellesley, Massachusetts. It is a popular destination for outdoor enthusiasts, offering a variety of recreational activities such as swimming, fishing, and boating. The pond is surrounded by scenic trails, making it an ideal spot for hiking and nature walks. During the summer months, the pond's beach area is a favorite for families looking to enjoy a day by the water. Morses Pond is managed by the local community, ensuring that it remains a clean and safe environment for visitors.

properties.name: Wellesley Town Hall
properties.location:
525 Washington St
Wellesley, MA 02482
United States
properties.description: Wellesley Town Hall, completed in 1886, is a prominent example of Richardsonian Romanesque architecture. It serves as the administrative center for the town of Wellesley, Massachusetts, housing various municipal offices and hosting town meetings. The building is characterized by its distinctive stone construction, arched windows, and a clock tower, making it a significant architectural landmark in the area. The town hall is situated in a picturesque setting, surrounded by lush greenery and providing a focal point for community events and civic activities.

properties.name: Wellesley College
properties.location:
106 Central St
Wellesley, MA 02481
United States
properties.description: Wellesley College, established in 1870, is renowned for its beautiful campus and commitment to women's education. Situated on 500 acres, it features stunning landscapes, gardens, and over 40 academic buildings. The college boasts a rich history of empowering women and fostering intellectual growth. Visitors can explore the campus's architectural landmarks, including the Houghton Chapel and the Green Hall, and enjoy the serene surroundings typical of a New England landscape. Wellesley College also offers cultural and artistic events that attract audiences beyond its student body.

properties.name: Natick Center Associates
properties.location:
8 Court St
Natick, MA 01760
United States
properties.description: Natick Center Associates is recognized as a landmark in Natick, Massachusetts. It serves as a hub for cultural and community events, such as the Multicultural Fair, which celebrates the diversity and unique cultures that contribute to the American identity. The fair features a variety of activities, including performances by dancers, live entertainment, and participation from local vendors and groups, such as Poppin Beans. The event is organized by Athena Pandolf and her team, with contributions from local figures like author Deborah Mitchell. The center is a gathering place for people from different backgrounds, fostering a sense of community and cultural exchange. Located at 8 Court Street, it plays a significant role in the local cultural landscape, hosting events that bring together residents and visitors alike.

properties.name: Sri Lakshmi Temple
properties.location:
117 Waverly St
Ashland, MA 01721
United States
properties.description: Sri Lakshmi Temple, situated in Ashland, Massachusetts, is a prominent Hindu temple dedicated to Goddess Lakshmi. The temple serves as a spiritual center for the local community, offering a peaceful environment for prayer, meditation, and cultural events. The architecture reflects traditional Indian style, creating an inviting atmosphere for worshippers and visitors. Various religious ceremonies and festivals are celebrated throughout the year, fostering a sense of community among attendees. The temple also provides educational programs and activities that promote cultural awareness and understanding.

properties.name: Ashland State Park
properties.location:
156 W Union St
Ashland, MA 01721
United States
properties.description: Ashland State Park encompasses 470 acres of forest surrounding the 157-acre Ashland Reservoir. The park features a 3.5-mile hiking trail that loops around the reservoir, providing scenic views year-round. Visitors can engage in activities such as hiking, swimming, fishing, mountain biking, and boating. The park offers limited picnic areas equipped with charcoal grills and tables. During peak summer months, parking lots may reach capacity; it's advisable to plan ahead and arrive early to secure a spot.

properties.name: Hopkinton Town Common
properties.location: 6 Hayden Rowe St, Hopkinton, MA 01748, United States
properties.description: Hopkinton Town Common is a scenic public park that serves as the heart of the community in Hopkinton, Massachusetts. It features expansive green lawns, walking paths, and several historical monuments, making it a popular spot for both locals and visitors. The Common hosts various community events throughout the year, offering a peaceful place to relax, enjoy recreational activities, and appreciate the surrounding natural beauty. The area is easily accessible and promotes a sense of community spirit.

properties.name: La Voile
properties.location:
261 Newbury St
Boston, MA 02116
United States
properties.description: La Voile is an authentic French brasserie located at 261 Newbury Street in Boston's Back Bay neighborhood. Established in 2007, it brings the warmth and elegance of the French Riviera to Boston, offering a cozy atmosphere reminiscent of Parisian bistros. The restaurant features classic French dishes such as escargots, duck confit, and bouillabaisse, complemented by an extensive selection of French wines. The interior boasts rich burgundy and oak decor, creating an intimate dining experience. La Voile is also conveniently situated near several of Boston's major concert venues, making it an ideal spot for pre-show or post-concert dining.

properties.name: Select Oyster Bar
properties.location:
50 Gloucester St
Boston, MA 02115
United States
properties.description: Select Oyster Bar is a neighborhood seafood restaurant in Boston's Back Bay, offering a menu that emphasizes local oysters, crudo, ceviche, and Spanish octopus. The kitchen focuses on simple, seasonal preparations of high-quality seafood. The wine program features seafood-centric selections, and the bar serves cocktails made with small-batch artisanal spirits. Opened in April 2015, the restaurant has received accolades such as Boston Magazine's Best New Restaurant 2015 and Best Wine Program 2016, and Improper Bostonian's Best Seafood 2015 & 2016.

properties.name: Krasi
properties.location:
48 Gloucester St
Boston, MA 02115
United States
properties.description: Krasi is a Greek wine bar in Boston's Back Bay, offering a modern twist on traditional Greek meze. The menu features dishes like crispy chicken thigh over chickpea stew and Mediterranean seabass wrapped in grape leaves. Vegetarians can enjoy options such as celery root dumplings with sweet potato, pine nuts, and currants. The extensive wine list includes over 180 natural, organic, and biodynamic Greek wines. The chic and rustic ambiance provides a warm and inviting atmosphere for guests.

properties.name: The Bebop
properties.location:
1116 Boylston St
Boston, MA 02215
United States
properties.description: The Bebop is a vibrant restaurant and music venue situated at 1116 Boylston Street in Boston's Back Bay neighborhood. Established by the owners of The Burren, it offers a fusion of traditional Irish pub fare and live entertainment. The menu features classics like Guinness Lamb Stew and vegetarian Shepherd's Pie, complemented by a selection of specialty cocktails, beer, and wine. Live music performances are held seven days a week, enhancing the lively atmosphere. The venue is conveniently located near the Berklee College of Music, making it a popular spot for both locals and visitors seeking a dynamic dining and entertainment experience.

properties.name: Eastern Standard
properties.location:
775 Beacon St
Boston, MA 02215
United States
properties.description: Eastern Standard is a modern brasserie offering seasonally focused New England interpretations of classic brasserie fare. The menu features raw bar selections, charcuterie, and dishes like Frisée aux Lardons, Steak Tartare, Baked Rigatoni, and Butterscotch Bread Pudding. The beverage program includes craft cocktails, a curated selection of wines, and craft beers from near and far. The restaurant is located in the Fenway neighborhood, in the Bower apartment complex at 775 Beacon Street.

properties.name: Audubon Boston
properties.location:
838 Beacon St
Boston, MA 02215
USA
properties.description: Audubon Boston is a casual dining spot situated near Fenway Park, offering a diverse menu that includes traditional bar food and sit-down entrees. The seasonal menu features items like barbecue pork hash with eggs, breakfast lasagna, salt and pepper shrimp, grilled flank steak, and seared hoisin duck. The restaurant boasts a backyard garden patio, providing a relaxed atmosphere for guests. Additionally, Audubon Boston hosts live music and broadcasts major sporting events on large-screen TVs, enhancing the dining experience.

properties.name: Japonaise Bakery & Cafe
properties.location:
1020 Beacon St
Brookline, MA 02446
USA
properties.description: Established in 1985, Japonaise Bakery & Cafe offers a unique fusion of Japanese and French pastries. The bakery is renowned for its delicate croissants, creamy puffs, savory onigiri, and croquette sandwiches. Signature items include the Jiji chocolate-filled bread and the raspberry cream croissant, showcasing high-quality ingredients and authentic flavors. The whimsical atmosphere, adorned with charming figures and plushies, creates a playful dining environment. While the bakery primarily operates as a counter-service establishment with limited seating, it provides a delightful experience for those seeking authentic Japanese-inspired baked goods.

properties.name: Paris Creperie
properties.location:
278 Harvard St
Brookline, MA 02446
USA
properties.description: Paris Creperie is a cozy café in Brookline, Massachusetts, offering a diverse menu of sweet and savory crepes. Their offerings include classics like Nutella and fresh strawberries, as well as inventive creations such as the 'Napoleon' crepe. The café also serves fresh smoothies and high-quality coffee and espresso. The interior features a French ambiance with vintage black-and-white photos and nostalgic music. While the space is intimate and can become busy, the efficient service and variety of options, including vegetarian and organic dishes, ensure a pleasant dining experience.

properties.name: Prairie Fire
properties.location: 242 Harvard St, Brookline, MA 02446, United States
properties.description: Prairie Fire is a New American restaurant in Brookline, MA, known for its wood-fired cooking. The menu features pizzas, house-made pastas, and seasonal vegetable dishes. The restaurant also offers a full bar with craft beers and cocktails.

properties.name: Stoked Wood Fired Pizza Co.
properties.location:
1632 Beacon St
Brookline, MA 02446
United States
properties.description: Stoked Wood Fired Pizza Co. is a popular eatery in Brookline, Massachusetts, known for its wood-fired pizzas and diverse menu catering to various dietary preferences, including vegan and vegetarian options. The restaurant offers a selection of creative pies, draft cocktails, and craft beers, providing a unique dining experience. Customers appreciate the balanced flavors, crisp crusts, and light, chewy textures of the pizzas. The establishment also features a fun atmosphere, with complimentary Rice Krispy treats accompanying some orders. While some patrons note that portion sizes for non-pizza items can be questionable and pricey, the overall dining experience is enjoyable.

properties.name: Livite
properties.location:
1644 Beacon St
Brookline, MA 02445
USA
properties.description: Livite is a health-focused restaurant located in Brookline, Massachusetts. Founded by Laurie, a registered dietitian, and Steve, a seasoned restaurant manager, Livite offers a variety of smoothies, salads, wraps, and juices made with fresh, nutritious ingredients. The menu includes options like the PB&J smoothie, Nutty Professor smoothie, Dr. Green smoothie, Bacon Chicken wrap, and Plant-Based Thai Peanut Salad. Customers appreciate the variety of vegan and gluten-free options, along with tasty salads and juices like the Green Healthy Monster and Buffalo Chicken Salad with Herb Vinaigrette Dressing. The wraps are generously loaded with ingredients and taste fantastic, defying the usual tortilla-with-some-ingredients expectation. The smoothies are also highly praised, making Livite a go-to place for healthy, flavorful food that leaves customers feeling great.

properties.name: The Publick House
properties.location:
1648 Beacon St
Brookline, MA 02445
United States
properties.description: The Publick House is a gastropub in Brookline, MA, renowned for its extensive selection of Belgian and American craft beers. The menu features hearty dishes like Trappist meatloaf and mussels prepared in various styles. The establishment has received numerous accolades, including being named 'Best Beer Bar in America' by BeerAdvocate.com and 'Best Mac & Cheese in the U.S.' by Food & Wine Magazine.

properties.name: Barcelona Wine Bar
properties.location:
1700 Beacon St
Brookline, MA 02446
United States
properties.description: Barcelona Wine Bar in Brookline offers a warm and welcoming atmosphere inspired by Spanish culture. The menu features a variety of tapas and entrees crafted with seasonal, locally sourced ingredients. Guests can enjoy an extensive selection of wines from Spain and South America, making it one of the largest Spanish wine programs in the U.S. The restaurant also provides options for takeout and outdoor seating, catering to diverse dining preferences.

properties.name: Cafe Landwer
properties.location:
383 Chestnut Hill Ave
Boston, MA 02135
United States
properties.description: Cafe Landwer features Mediterranean fare and spans breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Breakfast items include shakshuka and other egg-based dishes, yogurt, and more, while lunch and dinner delve into sandwiches, salads, pasta, pizza, and other items.

properties.name: Energize
properties.location:
1930 Beacon St
Boston, MA 02135
USA
properties.description: Energize is a health-focused restaurant located at 1930 Beacon Street in Boston's Brighton neighborhood. It specializes in organic, plant-based meals, offering a variety of salads, smoothie bowls, and juices. The menu features items like the Acai bowl, Custom Salad, and Protein Bowl, catering to those seeking nutritious options. The establishment has received positive reviews for its fresh ingredients and flavorful offerings, making it a popular choice for health-conscious diners in the area.

properties.name: The Circle Tavern
properties.location:
356 Chestnut Hill Ave Suite B
Brighton, MA 02135
United States
properties.description: The Circle Tavern is a lively bar and restaurant located at 356 Chestnut Hill Ave Suite B, Brighton, MA 02135. It offers a welcoming atmosphere with a diverse selection of craft beers, signature cocktails, and a menu featuring pub fare such as pizza, burgers, and appetizers. The establishment is known for its big screens showing sports events and a friendly staff, creating a fun environment suitable for college students. However, some patrons have noted long wait times for food and occasional smoke issues due to its open-window setup.

properties.name: Fin's Sushi & Grill
properties.location:
354 Chestnut Hill Ave
Brighton, MA 02135
United States
properties.description: Fin's Sushi & Grill offers a diverse menu of traditional Japanese cuisine, including sushi, sashimi, and teriyaki dishes. The restaurant emphasizes the use of fresh, natural ingredients to create authentic flavors. With a comfortable dining environment and friendly service, Fin's aims to provide a memorable experience for its patrons.

properties.name: El Pelón Taqueria
properties.location:
2197 Commonwealth Ave
Boston, MA 02135
United States
properties.description: El Pelón Taqueria is a vibrant eatery in Boston, celebrated for its authentic Mexican food, particularly its flavorful tacos, burritos, and salsas. The restaurant features a lively atmosphere with colorful decor that reflects the spirit of Mexican culture. El Pelón prides itself on using fresh ingredients and traditional recipes, offering various options to cater to different tastes, including vegetarian fare. With a focus on casual dining, it's a popular spot for locals seeking a quick and delicious meal, whether dining in or taking out.

properties.name: White Mountain Creamery
properties.location:
19 Commonwealth Ave
Chestnut Hill, MA 02467
United States

properties.name: Blacker's Bakeshop
properties.location:
543 Commonwealth Ave
Newton, MA 02459
United States
properties.description: Blacker's Bakeshop, established in 2008, is a family-owned bakery in Newton, Massachusetts, specializing in kosher, dairy-free, and nut-free baked goods. Their offerings include challah, babka, rugelach, and custom cakes, catering to various dietary needs. The bakery is supervised by Rabbi Hamaoui through New England Kashruth (Crown K).

properties.name: Inna's Kitchen
properties.location:
547 Commonwealth Ave
Newton Centre, MA 02459
United States
properties.description: Inna's Kitchen Culinaria specializes in wholesome, prepared foods, including frozen soups, entrees, deli salads, baked goods, and Jewish specialties. The kitchen is dedicated gluten-free, dairy-free, nut-free, and Kosher Pareve, ensuring inclusivity for those with dietary restrictions. Certified Kosher Pareve under Lighthouse Kosher supervision, the establishment emphasizes quality and nutrition in its offerings.

properties.name: Papa Razzi Wellesley
properties.location:
16 Washington St
Wellesley, MA 02481
United States
properties.description: Papa Razzi Wellesley is an Italian trattoria offering a variety of classic dishes such as wood-fired pizzas, homemade pastas, and grilled meats. The restaurant features a full bar and provides options for gluten-free pasta and pizza. It also offers a private dining area accommodating up to 100 guests for seated events and 175 guests for cocktail receptions. The ambiance is casual, suitable for both adults and children, with a large children's menu available.

properties.name: CK Shanghai
properties.location:
15 Washington St
Wellesley, MA 02481
United States
properties.description: CK Shanghai, established in 2005, offers a distinctive blend of traditional and innovative Chinese cuisine. The menu features a variety of dishes, including Peking Ravioli, Shanghai's House Fried Rice, and Tangerine Crispy Beef. The restaurant is known for its charming ambiance, full bar, and weekend dim sum brunch. Chef C.K. Sau, originally from Hong Kong, brings extensive culinary experience to the establishment, having honed his skills in cities like Beijing, Shanghai, Milan, Paris, and New York. CK Shanghai is recognized for its polished quality and attention to detail, making it a local favorite in Wellesley.

properties.name: Cooks Window Pizza
properties.location:
19 Washington St
Wellesley, MA 02481
United States
properties.description: Cooks Window Pizza is a local pizzeria in Wellesley, MA, specializing in Italian thin-crust pizzas and a variety of Italian dishes. Their menu features specialty pizzas like the White Buffalo Chicken Pizza and the Cooks Margherita Pizza, along with calzones, pasta, salads, and sandwiches. They offer dine-in, takeout, and delivery services, catering to Wellesley and surrounding areas. The restaurant is known for its fresh ingredients and friendly service, making it a popular choice among locals.

properties.name: Jin Fine Asian
properties.location:
11 Washington St
Wellesley, MA 02481
United States
properties.description: Jin Fine Asian is a contemporary restaurant located at 11 Washington St, Wellesley, MA 02481. It offers a diverse menu featuring Chinese and Japanese dishes, including sushi. The establishment provides various dining options such as delivery, takeout, and dine-in services. The ambiance is casual and cozy, with a full bar available. The menu includes a range of offerings, including alcohol, beer, cocktails, coffee, comfort food, hard liquor, healthy options, quick bites, small plates, vegetarian options, and wine. The restaurant accepts reservations and credit cards, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover, and American Express. Parking is available on the street. The establishment is wheelchair accessible, with accessible entrances, parking, restrooms, and seating.

properties.name: Wellesley North End Pizza
properties.location:
7 Washington St
Wellesley, MA 02481
United States
properties.description: Wellesley North End Pizza is a family-friendly eatery located in Wellesley, Massachusetts. The menu features a wide range of Italian-American dishes, such as brick-oven pizzas, calzones, subs, salads, and pasta. Signature items include the Meat Lover's Pizza, Sorrento Pizza, and Caesar Salad. The restaurant offers both takeout and delivery services, catering to various preferences. Customers have praised the generous portions and friendly service, making it a popular choice among locals.

properties.name: Yama
properties.location:
245 Washington St
Wellesley, MA 02481
United States
properties.description: Yama is a Japanese restaurant situated at 245 Washington St, Wellesley, MA 02481. It offers a diverse menu featuring signature rolls like the Fire Dragon Roll and Red Sox Maki, along with desserts such as fried ice cream. The restaurant provides dine-in, takeout, and delivery services within a four-mile radius. The interior features low tables where guests can remove their shoes, creating an authentic Japanese dining experience. Yama has been in operation since 1996 and is known for its welcoming atmosphere and quality cuisine.

properties.name: Quebrada Baking Company
properties.location:
272 Washington St
Wellesley, MA 02481
United States
properties.description: Quebrada Baking Company is a family-owned bakery in Wellesley, Massachusetts, offering a variety of handmade desserts, breads, and breakfast pastries, complemented by quality coffee. Their menu includes popular items like croissants, cookies, and cupcakes. The bakery provides a cozy atmosphere with seating options for customers to enjoy their treats. Convenient parking is available, with free parking in front, alongside the building, and on the side street, as well as metered street parking on the next block.

properties.name: Singh's Cafe
properties.location:
312 Washington St
Wellesley, MA 02481
United States
properties.description: Singh's Cafe offers a transformed Punjabi style of cooking, blending traditional recipes with unique exotic flavors. The menu features a combination of North Indian Punjabi, Lucknow, and Hyderabadi cuisine, intermixed with rare South Indian flavors. The restaurant provides an ever-changing lunch buffet daily and fine dining in the evenings, with options including appetizers, kebabs, vegetarian and non-vegetarian curries, and desserts. Delivery, online ordering, and catering services are also available.

properties.name: The Local
properties.location:
11 Forest St
Wellesley, MA 02481-6831
United States
properties.description: The Local offers a pub-like atmosphere in Wellesley, Massachusetts, where patrons can enjoy a variety of comfort foods. The restaurant is adorned with nostalgic photographs of Wellesley's past, adding a unique local touch. The menu caters to diverse tastes, featuring items from burgers to salmon, and includes a selection of local beers. While some find the prices a bit steep, the overall dining experience is enhanced by friendly service and a lively ambiance. The Local does not take reservations, which can make it a bustling spot, especially on weekends. Despite being part of a chain, it maintains a community feel, making it a favored spot for both casual outings and more formal gatherings.

properties.name: The Local Kitchen & Drinks Wellesley
properties.location:
11 Forest St
Wellesley Hills, MA 02481
United States
properties.description: The Local Kitchen & Drinks in Wellesley Hills, Massachusetts, is a vibrant dining establishment that celebrates local flavors with a diverse menu of American comfort food and innovative cocktails. The restaurant features a cozy atmosphere, with each location reflecting the unique character of its community. Guests can enjoy a variety of dishes, including award-winning burgers, fresh salads, and daily specials, all crafted with high-quality, locally sourced ingredients. The bar offers a selection of handcrafted cocktails, draft beers, and an extensive wine list, making it an ideal spot for social gatherings. In addition to its inviting ambiance, The Local provides catering services and private dining options for special events, accommodating both casual meals and larger gatherings.

properties.name: Wellesley Bakery
properties.location:
542 Washington St # 1
Wellesley, MA 02482
United States
properties.description: Wellesley Bakery, located at 542 Washington St #1 in Wellesley, MA, is a cherished local establishment offering a diverse selection of freshly prepared baked goods and savory dishes. The menu features an array of pastries, muffins, bread, soups, sandwiches, salads, and quiches. Signature items include the Super Special Chicken Sandwich, pecan rolls, chocolate chip cookies, lemon chicken soup, and fresh spring rolls. The bakery is owned by a Cambodian refugee family and has been serving the community for nearly 30 years, earning a reputation for high-quality food and friendly service. The unassuming and casual setting adds to its charm, making it a favorite among locals and visitors alike.

properties.name: Cafe Mangal
properties.location:
555 Washington St #1
Wellesley, MA 02482
United States
properties.description: Cafe Mangal, established in 2000, is a family-owned restaurant in Wellesley, Massachusetts, offering Mediterranean and American cuisine with Turkish influences. The menu features a variety of dishes, including soups, salads, appetizers, and main courses, all made with fresh, high-quality ingredients. The restaurant is BYOB and provides catering services. It has received positive reviews for its food and atmosphere.

properties.name: Juniper
properties.location:
13 Central St
Wellesley, MA 02482
United States
properties.description: Juniper is a Mediterranean bistro in Wellesley, Massachusetts, offering Eastern Mediterranean cuisine in a vibrant, colorfully adorned space. The menu features dishes like lamb tartare, baharat-spiced crispy oysters, and smoked eggplant baba ghanoush. Entrees include smoky lamb bolognese with handmade saffron pappardelle, grilled baharat skirt steak topped with whipped feta yogurt, and roasted pork tenderloin with pomegranate barbecue sauce. Desserts such as pecan pie baklava are also available. The restaurant has a full bar and offers both indoor and outdoor seating.

properties.name: J.P. Licks
properties.location:
63 Central St
Wellesley, MA 02482
USA
properties.description: J.P. Licks is an ice cream maker, a coffee roaster, an institution, a winner of more than 300 "Best" awards, a fair employer, a good neighbor, a Boston business, owned and operated by its founder, since 1981. Born in JP.

properties.name: Lockheart Restaurant
properties.location:
102 Central St
Wellesley, MA 02482
United States
properties.description: Lockheart Restaurant, located at 102 Central Street in Wellesley, MA, offers a vibrant dining experience with a focus on Southwestern-style dishes, particularly tacos. The menu features a variety of options, including Chilled Lobster, Korean Brussels Sprouts, and Short Rib Birria tacos. Additional offerings include Street Corn, Lobster Guacamole, and a selection of bowls and salads. The cocktail menu presents classic drinks with modern twists, crafted by skilled bartenders. The restaurant provides a family-friendly atmosphere with both indoor and outdoor seating, accommodating various group sizes. Private events can be hosted in the downstairs lounge area, which includes a full bar and high-top seating. Ample parking is available behind the restaurant and along Central Avenue.

properties.name: Alta Strada
properties.location:
92 Central St
Wellesley, MA 02482
United States
properties.description: Alta Strada, located at 92 Central Street in Wellesley, MA, is an Italian restaurant known for its house-made pastas, authentic Italian classics, and a selection of wines. (shopwellesleysquare.com) The menu features dishes inspired by regions such as Tuscany, Emilia-Romagna, Piedmont, and the Amalfi coast. (vrconcierge.com) The restaurant offers a warm and casual atmosphere with brick walls and bare wood floors. (gayot.com) Popular menu items include crunchy meatballs with spicy tomato basil sauce, lune with mushrooms, truffle, and Parmigiano, tagliatelle Bolognese, chicken Milanese, and chicken Parmesan. (restaurantji.com) The restaurant has received positive reviews for its food, ambiance, and service. (tripadvisor.com)

properties.name: FressCafe Natick
properties.location:
158 E Central St
Natick, MA 01760
United States
properties.description: FressCafe Natick is a cozy eatery specializing in breakfast and lunch, known for its homestyle cooking and welcoming atmosphere. The menu features a variety of dishes, including eggs Benedict, fluffy waffles, hearty paninis, and wraps, all made with fresh, high-quality ingredients. The cafe offers both indoor and outdoor seating, with wide windows that let in ample natural light, creating a bright and inviting space. Guests can enjoy classic breakfast items like pancakes and omelettes, as well as lunch options such as burgers and salads. The friendly and attentive staff contribute to a pleasant dining experience, making it a popular spot for locals and visitors alike.

properties.name: Mexicali Cantina Grill
properties.location:
148 E Central St
Natick, MA 01760
United States
properties.description: Mexicali Cantina Grill is a vibrant Mexican restaurant in Natick, MA, offering a lively atmosphere and a menu filled with authentic Mexican cuisine. Guests can enjoy a variety of dishes, from savory tacos and burritos to fresh salads and specialty salsas, all made with quality ingredients. The casual and welcoming environment makes it a perfect spot for families and friends to gather and savor a taste of Mexico.

properties.name: Morse Tavern
properties.location:
85 E Central St Suite B
Natick, MA 01760
United States
properties.description: Morse Tavern, located at 85 E Central St Suite B in Natick, MA, is a neighborhood pub offering a diverse American menu in a relaxed sports bar setting. The menu features a variety of appetizers, salads, burgers, sandwiches, and entrees. The establishment holds a full liquor license, serving wine, beer, and mixed drinks. Morse Tavern also hosts live music on weekends and provides private function rooms for events and business meetings. The Union Square room accommodates up to 20 guests, while McMahon Hall can host up to 60 guests. The venue offers catering options and has a sister restaurant in Marlborough, MA, called Bolton Street Tavern, featuring similar food choices and amenities.

properties.name: Pizza By Rocco
properties.location:
3 Union St
Natick, MA 01760
USA
properties.description: Pizza By Rocco is a local pizzeria in Natick, MA, known for its authentic Italian-style pizzas and diverse menu offerings. The restaurant emphasizes the use of fresh, locally sourced ingredients to create a variety of dishes, including traditional and gourmet pizzas, pasta, subs, and salads. Customers appreciate the quality of the food and the friendly service provided by the staff. The establishment offers both pickup and delivery options, catering to a wide range of tastes and preferences.

properties.name: Shanghai Tokyo
properties.location:
54 E Central St
Natick, MA 01760
United States
properties.description: Shanghai Tokyo is a family-owned restaurant in Natick, MA, offering a blend of Chinese and Japanese cuisine. Established over 19 years ago, it serves authentic family recipes using fresh ingredients. The menu features a variety of dishes, including house specialties, noodles, moo-shi, chop suey, and chow mein. Gluten-free options and allergy-friendly meals are available upon request. The restaurant provides take-out and delivery services daily, with dine-in options from Wednesday to Sunday. Customers have praised the quality of the food, friendly service, and cozy atmosphere.

properties.name: Bill's Pizzeria
properties.location:
58 E Central St
Natick, MA 01760
United States
properties.description: Bill's Pizzeria, located at 58 E Central St in Natick, MA, offers a diverse menu featuring 23 types of pizza, including specialty options like the 'Purple Pizza' and 'Spanakopizza.' In addition to pizza, the restaurant serves subs, sandwiches, and calzones, with gluten-free and whole wheat crusts available. Customers appreciate the fresh ingredients, generous toppings, and the option to enjoy beer and wine with their meals. The cozy atmosphere and friendly service contribute to its reputation as a local favorite.

properties.name: Buttercup
properties.location:
13 W Central St
Natick, MA 01760
United States
properties.description: Buttercup is a contemporary American farm-to-table restaurant located in Natick, Massachusetts. Opened in 2018, it offers a menu that emphasizes fresh, locally sourced ingredients. The restaurant features a cozy interior and a vibrant bar area, providing a welcoming atmosphere for diners. Signature dishes include buttermilk cornbread with lavender-honey and homemade ricotta, as well as spicy Maine mussels with coconut milk and Thai green curry. The drink menu boasts creative cocktails and a selection of craft beers and wines from small producers. With a commitment to supporting local farms and artisans, Buttercup provides a unique dining experience in the heart of Natick.

properties.name: Lola's Italian Groceria
properties.location:
9 Main St
Natick, MA 01760
United States
properties.description: Lola's Italian Groceria is a family-owned restaurant in Natick, MA, specializing in Italian cuisine. They offer a variety of dishes, including subs, panini, wraps, and homemade take-home dinners. The establishment also provides catering services and features a selection of Italian groceries. Notably, Lola's offers gluten-free options, such as gluten-free cannoli shells and subs, catering to dietary preferences. The restaurant is known for its generous portions and fresh ingredients, with bread brought in daily from Boston's North End. The cozy interior provides a welcoming atmosphere for diners.

properties.name: Biryaniz N Breadz
properties.location:
195 W Central St
Natick, MA 01760
United States
properties.description: Biryaniz N Breadz is an Indian restaurant in Natick, Massachusetts, offering a diverse menu of authentic dishes. Signature items include chicken biryani, garlic naan, and a variety of vegetarian options. The restaurant provides a welcoming atmosphere with comfortable seating and family-friendly service. Customers appreciate the efficient service and the ability to cater to large gatherings, highlighting successful catering experiences for events like Diwali and graduation parties. The establishment also features a bakery with fresh cookies, cakes, and snacks, as well as a full-service bar with a variety of drinks.

properties.name: Aztec Restaurant
properties.location:
2 Waverly St
Framingham, MA 01702
United States
properties.description: Aztec Restaurant is a vibrant eatery located at 2 Waverly St, Framingham, MA 01702, specializing in authentic Mexican cuisine. The menu features a variety of traditional dishes, including burritos, enchiladas, tacos, and fajitas. The restaurant is known for its colorful and inviting decor, creating a warm atmosphere for diners. It offers both indoor and outdoor seating options, accommodating various preferences. Customers have praised the establishment for its flavorful food and friendly service. The restaurant also provides takeout and delivery services, making it convenient for those who prefer to enjoy their meals at home.

properties.name: Terra Brasilis Restaurant
properties.location:
264 Waverly St
Framingham, MA 01702
USA
properties.description: Terra Brasilis Restaurant - Waverly Street offers an authentic Brazilian dining experience in Framingham, MA. The buffet-style service allows guests to select from a wide array of hot and cold dishes, including salads, stews, and grilled meats. Signature items include tender beef ribs and chicken wrapped in bacon. The self-serve format enables patrons to curate their plates, making each visit unique. Desserts like brigadeiro and freshly squeezed juices provide a sweet finish to the meal. The restaurant's clean ambiance, friendly staff, and ample parking enhance the dining experience.

properties.name: Framingham Station
properties.location:
417 Waverly St
Framingham, MA 01702
United States
properties.description: Framingham Station is a Brazilian steakhouse situated in a historic 1885 train station designed by H.H. Richardson. The restaurant offers a rodízio-style dining experience, featuring a continuous selection of fire-grilled meats such as picanha, ribs, lamb, pork, chicken, and sausages. Guests can also enjoy a buffet with a variety of hot and cold dishes. The interior boasts a handcrafted brick fireplace extending 30 feet high, creating a unique and inviting atmosphere. The establishment provides dine-in, takeout, and catering services, accommodating both individual diners and private events.

properties.name: Pão Brasil Bakery
properties.location:
596 Waverly St
Framingham, MA 01702
United States
properties.description: Pao Brasil Bakery is a family-owned Brazilian bakery and restaurant located at 596 Waverly Street, Framingham, MA 01702. The establishment offers a variety of traditional Brazilian dishes, including Brazilian BBQ, baked and fried appetizers, soups, breads, pastries, and desserts. The owners, Milca and Delio Lopes, originally from Minas Gerais, Brazil, aim to provide an authentic Brazilian experience to the Boston region. The bakery operates daily from 5:00 AM to 11:00 PM.

properties.name: Fanny's Italian Kitchen
properties.location:
911 Waverly St
Framingham, MA 01702
United States
properties.description: Fanny's Italian Kitchen is a family-owned restaurant in Framingham, Massachusetts, known for its traditional Italian cuisine. Established in 1946, it has been a local favorite for many years. The menu features a variety of Italian dishes, including chicken and veal parmigiana, lasagna, and meatballs. The restaurant also offers gluten-free options, such as pasta and pizza. In addition to its dining services, Fanny's Italian Kitchen provides catering and event hosting in its function room, accommodating up to 90 guests. The establishment is recognized for its homemade salad dressings and marinara sauces, which are sold under the Fanny label in supermarkets across New England.

properties.name: Dulce D Leche
properties.location:
200 Homer Ave
Ashland, MA 01721
United States
properties.description: Dulce D Leche is a scratch bakery, gelato maker, and cafe based in Ashland, Massachusetts. They produce artisan sourdough breads, cakes, pies, croissants, cookies, and specialty pastries. Their top cookies include Argentinian alfajores, Millionaires shortbread, and chocolate chip. Frozen dinners such as chicken pot pies, shepherd's pies, lasagna, and chicken tikka are also available. The cafe offers breakfast sandwiches and gyros with shawarma, Mediterranean chicken, and falafel. Their croissants come in various flavors, including plain, chocolate, almond, spinach & feta, bacon & cheddar, and prosciutto & asiago. Brioche pastries include cinnamon rolls, pecan sticky buns, and Slavic Kolache with sweet walnut paste. Pies are typically sized for 1-2 people and for 8 people with a wide variety of house-made fillings. They also offer hand-scooped gelato in 5 flavors from a mobile freezer cart at some farmer's markets. Weather permitting, they bring some of their chocolate items, including pecan turtles, salted cashew turtles, chocolate dipped potato chips, truffles, and more.

properties.name: Doragon Eatery
properties.location:
1 W Union St
Ashland, MA 01721
United States
properties.description: Doragon Eatery, located at 1 W Union St in Ashland, Massachusetts, is a restaurant specializing in authentic Japanese ramen and hand-made dumplings. Co-owned by Paponake and Alan MacIntosh, the eatery offers a diverse menu of Asian comfort foods, including wings and bubble tea. The establishment has evolved over time, rebranding from Doragon Ramen to Doragon Eatery in 2024 to reflect its expanded offerings. Operating hours are Tuesday through Sunday, from 4:30 PM to 9:00 PM, and it is closed on Mondays.

properties.name: 2Mauro's Cafe
properties.location:
372 Union St
Ashland, MA 01721
United States
properties.description: 2Mauro's Cafe is a family-owned establishment in Ashland, Massachusetts, offering a variety of breakfast and lunch options. The menu features dishes like eggs benedict, omelets, pancakes, and sandwiches, all made with fresh, locally sourced ingredients. The cafe is known for its friendly and attentive service, creating a welcoming atmosphere for patrons. The interior boasts a modern rustic decor, providing a cozy dining experience. Customers appreciate the generous portion sizes and the quality of the food, making it a popular spot for both locals and visitors.

properties.name: Hanto Restaurant
properties.location:
380 Union St
Ashland, MA 01721
United States
properties.description: Hanto Restaurant is a Chinese and Japanese restaurant located at 380 Union St, Ashland, MA 01721. The restaurant offers a diverse menu featuring authentic Chinese and Japanese dishes, including sushi, prepared with high-quality ingredients. Customers have praised the restaurant for its generous portions, flavorful dishes, and attentive service. The warm and inviting atmosphere makes it suitable for both casual meals and special occasions. Hanto Restaurant provides dine-in, takeout, and delivery options, catering to a wide range of dining preferences.

properties.name: TJ's Food & Spirits
properties.location:
355 W Union St
Ashland, MA 01721
United States
properties.description: TJ's Food & Spirits, established in 1980, is a family-owned restaurant located on the Ashland/Hopkinton town line. It offers a diverse menu of home-cooked American dishes at reasonable prices, including daily specials that showcase the chefs' creativity. The Tomasz family emphasizes treating guests and employees like family, creating a welcoming atmosphere for all patrons. The restaurant provides both indoor and outdoor seating options, accommodating various preferences. Additionally, TJ's offers full-service catering for events of all sizes, ensuring a memorable dining experience beyond the restaurant setting.

properties.name: Pan Thai Restaurant
properties.location:
15 Main St
Hopkinton, MA 01748
United States
properties.description: Pan Thai Restaurant, located at 15 Main St in Hopkinton, MA, offers a cozy dining experience with a menu featuring traditional Thai dishes such as Pad Thai, Drunken Noodles, Thai Curry, and Fried Rice. The restaurant also provides Chef's Specials like Tamarind Duck and Salmon Choo-Chee. The interior boasts a horseshoe-shaped bar and a fireplace, creating a warm atmosphere. Outdoor seating is available during warmer months. Pan Thai accommodates various dietary preferences, offering gluten-free, vegan, and vegetarian options. The establishment provides takeout and delivery services, and reservations are accepted. Free parking is available on both Main and Church streets.

properties.name: Blue Square Pizza
properties.location:
30 Main St
Hopkinton, MA 01748
United States
properties.description: Blue Square Pizza, established in 2022, specializes in sourdough pizzas, offering Detroit-style, grandma-style, Chicago cracker thin, and New York-style round pies. The pizzeria emphasizes quality by sourcing fresh ingredients and employing traditional bread-baking techniques for its dough. Menu items include salads, house-made meatballs, and fresh chicken wings. The establishment has been recognized with awards such as Pizza Today's 2023 'Startup Pizzeria of the Year' and ranking 51st in Pizza Marketplace's Top 100 Movers and Shakers of 2024. Blue Square Pizza provides pickup, dine-in, and delivery services.

properties.name: ARCOS Cucina + Bar
properties.location:
42 Main St
Hopkinton, MA 01748
United States
properties.description: ARCOS Cucina + Bar is an upscale casual dining establishment in Hopkinton, MA, offering a fusion of classic Italian cuisine with Spanish and Portuguese influences. The restaurant features handcrafted cocktails, an eclectic wine list, and local craft beers, creating a vibrant atmosphere for guests. Parking is available in the rear lot on Walcott Street, with additional public parking across the street. Seating at the bar or patio is on a first-come, first-served basis, and a waitlist is managed when necessary. For large groups, reservations can be made by contacting the General Manager directly.
